t: Amazon has been quietly evolving Prime's look, and it signifies massive changes to the service

t: How Amazon Music took on the voice of the fans | The Drum
s: November 5, 2024 - Amazon Music’s mission is to ignite fandom and bring people closer to whom and what they love. But making that happen on social isn’t easy. Gen Z music fans don’t want to listen to brands. They want to listen to music.
